text: Flotsam Jetsam is an Australian Disco-funk band formed in Sydney in 1983. Their single "Show Me" was engineered by Guy Gray and it earned him a nomination for the 1987 ARIA Music Award for Engineer of the Year. ==Members== *Stephen Ferris (vocals) *Nick Ferris (bass, drum programming) *Tony Gilbert (guitar) *John Swanton (percussion) *Michael Iacano (keyboards) *Ashley Cadell (keyboards) *Peter Ciabo (drums) ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" border="1" |+ List of albums, with Australian chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2" style="width:12em;" | Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2" style="width:16em;" | Album details ! scope="col" colspan="1" | Peak chart positions |- ! scope="col" style="text-align:center;" | AUS |- ! scope="row" | Hororbox | * Released: August 1987 * Label: WEA (258887-1) | align="center" | 97 |} ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" border="1" |+ List of singles, with Australian chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Year ! scope="col" rowspan="2" style="width:13em;" | Title ! scope="col" colspan="1" | Peak chart positions |- ! scope="col" style="text-align:center;" | AUS |- | 1985 ! scope="row" | "100% 1 Second Love" | style="text-align:center;" | - |- |rowspan="2"| 1986 ! scope="row" |"Show Me" | style="text-align:center;" | - |- ! scope="row" |"Distraction" | style="text-align:center;" | 90 |- | 1987 ! scope="row" | "Power" | style="text-align:center;" |76 |} ==References== Category:New South Wales musical groups Category:Musical groups established in 1983 Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1988
